hero.title: About Momai Brass
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Precision Manufacturing Since 1993
hero.description: With three decades of expertise in precision component manufacturing, Momai Brass has been delivering high-quality metal parts to diverse industries. Our commitment to technological innovation and precision drives our continued success and customer satisfaction.

meta.title: Momai Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of experience, specializing in CNC machining for automotive, pneumatic, and hydraulic sectors.

cta.title: Partner with Precision Manufacturing Experts
cta.subtitle: Transform your project with our advanced manufacturing capabilities and technical expertise

items.title: Manufacturing Excellence Award
items.description: Recognized for outstanding precision manufacturing and technological innovation

items.title: Export Performance Award
items.description: Acknowledged for significant contributions to export of precision engineering components

items.title: Company Foundation
items.description: Established in Rajkot with a vision to provide high-precision metal components to industrial sectors

items.title: First CNC Machine Investment
items.description: Expanded manufacturing capabilities by investing in first CNC precision machining technology

items.title: Jamnagar Branch Establishment
items.description: Opened second manufacturing facility to enhance production capacity and geographic reach

items.title: Technology Modernization
items.description: Upgraded manufacturing infrastructure with advanced CNC machines and precision equipment

items.title: International Market Expansion
items.description: Began exporting precision components to international automotive and industrial markets

items.title: CNC Precision Machining
items.description: State-of-the-art CNC machining center capable of producing complex precision components with tight tolerances
items.specifications: Multi-axis capabilities, high-speed machining, precision tolerances within 0.01mm

items.content: Momai Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of expertise in producing high-quality metal parts for automotive, pneumatic, hydraulic, and electrical sectors. Our advanced CNC machining capabilities and commitment to technological innovation enable us to deliver exceptional precision components to global markets.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Collaborative design phase using advanced CAD/CAM technologies to develop precise component blueprints

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Carefully select high-quality brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper materials from trusted suppliers

items.title: CNC Machining
items.description: Utilize advanced CNC machines to transform raw materials into precision components with exceptional accuracy

items.title: Quality Inspection
items.description: Rigorous quality control using advanced measuring instruments to ensure dimensional accuracy and performance

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Apply specialized surface finishing techniques including deburring, polishing, and coating

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Carefully package components and ensure timely, secure delivery to customers worldwide
